SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.listeners

Class Listener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.listeners.Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonObjectiveCardListener, GoldDeckListener, PlayAreaListener, PlayerChooseObjectiveCardListener, PlayerHandListener, PlayerObjectiveCardListener, PlayerScoreListener, PlayerStarterCardListener, PlayerTurnListener, ResourceDeckListener
public abstract class Listener extends Object
This interface represents a generic listener that handles updates for virtual clients. Listeners are designed to retrieve updated data from the game model and send it to the clients. An update concerns a specific player but is still sent to all clients in the game. It is the responsibility of the clients to ignore the updates that do not concern them.

    sendUpdate(GameModel model, String username, VirtualClient client, ClientQueueObject clientQueueObject)

  • Method Details

    • sendUpdate

      protected void sendUpdate(GameModel model, String username, VirtualClient client, ClientQueueObject clientQueueObject)
      Sends an update to the specified virtual client. The update is sent asynchronously using a thread because it does not have to block the game in case the client is disconnected. If the thread notices, before sending the update, that the player has already been declared disconnected, the update is not sent.
      Parameters:
      model - The game model of the player
      username - The username of the player associated with the update.
      client - The virtual client to send the update to.
      clientQueueObject - The updated data to be sent to the client.
